name: Video Downloader for X
author: X Downloader

sections.description: The Video Downloader for X plugin enhances your websites features by adding a “Download” button below each embedded tweet. Your visitors can now download videos directly from Twitter posts displayed on your site by connecting to the official X Downloader API. The installation is simple, and there’s no configuration needed—just activate the plugin, and the download buttons will automatically appear.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/video-downloader-for-x directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. The plugin will now automatically show a “Get Video” and “Get MP3” button below each embedded Tweet in your posts.
sections.faq:
Can I download any Twitter video?

You can download videos from public tweets. Videos from private accounts cannot be downloaded.

Do I need a Twitter account to use this plugin?

No, you don’t need a Twitter account to download public Twitter videos.

short_description: Integrate download buttons next to embedded tweets and X posts, enabling users to download videos in MP4 and MP3 format.

The installation is simple, and there’s no configuration needed—just activate the plugin, and the download buttons will automatically appear.
